attributes.action: Suspend military aid to Israel until Human Rights Abuses fully investigated.
attributes.additional_details:
Since 1948, Israel has been carrying out continuous attacks on Palestinian civilians. In the last war, over 2,200 CIVILIANS were killed by IDF. In the past, they aided and supported Lebanese Death Squads (Shatila Massacre) and have bombed UN facilities
Shatila 1982: 3500 refugees murdered with support from Israeli Army.
Gaza 2014: 2200 killed, 10000 wounded (illegally bombing cvilian structures)
1948: Use of Barrel Bombs
Qibya: Reprisal attack on village. Violation of 1949 Armistice Agreement
attributes.background: Suspend all Military Aid to Israel until their human rights abuses are investigated in conjunction with an investigation into Hamas. Israel  violated UN Resolutions 28 TIMES; bombed UN schools and hospitals; aided the massacre of refugees; killed 2200 civilians without legal basis.
